description: This header file declares functions related to automatic timezone adjustment based on property change events, specifically monitoring the CPE_TZ property to update the internal clock accordingly.

methods.name: autoAdjustTimezone
methods.description: Adds the process as a property change listener for CPE_TZ to automatically adjust timezone when the property changes.

methods.name: disableAutoAdjustTimezone
methods.description: Stops listening to CPE_TZ property changes to halt automatic timezone adjustments.
